snippet: The state has withdrawn its offer of tax breaks for a religious-themed park that would feature a 500-foot-long wooden ark based on Noah’s Ark.
abstract: Kentucky rescinds offer of tax breaks for a religious-themed park that would feature a 500-foot-long wooden ark based on Noah’s Ark; state officials say planned project had changed from tourism attraction to outreach for Christian ministry.
lead_paragraph: The state has withdrawn its offer of tax breaks for a religious-themed park that would feature a 500-foot-long wooden ark based on Noah’s Ark.

headline.main: Kentucky: No Tax Break for Site of a New Noah’s Ark
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Tax Breaks Are Withdrawn for Park That’s Site of a New Noah’s Ark
